reviews.review_msg: Unbelievably unprofessional, close-minded, and arrogant.  Obviously has self-esteem and inadequacy issues he takes out on students under the guise of openness.  Not recommended.

Comes across real nice when you first meet him, but later you soon find out he is a very nasty, negative, and apathetic, making him very difficult to work with. Also his artistic taste is rigid and conservative... Avoid him if you can.
